input.requirements_yaml:
meta:
  original_request: Digital retail personalization copilot
input.product_vision:
product_name: Digital Retail Personalization Copilot
product_summary: An AI-powered assistant designed to empower digital retailers to
  deliver highly personalized customer experiences across their e-commerce platforms,
  driving engagement and sales by providing relevant product recommendations, dynamic
  content, and targeted promotions.
target_users:
- E-commerce managers
- Marketing teams in digital retail
- Product owners for online stores
value_proposition:
- Increase customer engagement and loyalty through tailored experiences
- Boost conversion rates and average order value
- Optimize marketing effectiveness by delivering relevant content
key_capabilities:
- AI-driven product recommendation engine
- Dynamic content personalization for website and email
- Customer segmentation and behavior analysis
- A/B testing framework for personalization strategies
- Performance analytics and insights on personalization impact
non_goals:
- To be a full e-commerce platform (e.g., shopping cart, payment processing)
- To replace existing CRM or ERP systems
- Generic business intelligence or analytics not directly related to personalization
success_metrics:
- Increase in conversion rate from personalized experiences
- Growth in average order value (AOV) for personalized interactions
- Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV) improvement
- Adoption rate of personalization features by retailers

input.concept: CRM para ventas con pipeline, forecasting y automatización de emails
input.requirements_yaml:
constraints:
- description: Restricción presupuestaria para la fase de desarrollo inicial
  id: C001
  priority: Low
- description: Limitaciones técnicas relacionadas con la integración existente con
    otras herramientas empresariales
  id: C002
  priority: Medium
- description: Plazo de entrega del proyecto dentro de un año desde el inicio
  id: C003
  priority: High
description: 'El proyecto propone desarrollar un sistema CRM (Customer Relationship
  Management) diseñado específicamente para el ámbito de ventas. Este CRM integrará
  una función de pipeline que permitirá a las empresas visualizar y gestionar en tiempo
  real la evolución de sus oportunidades de venta, facilitando así la planificación
  estratégica y la toma de decisiones informadas.


  Además, incorporará un módulo de previsión de ventas basado en datos históricos
  y tendencias actuales, lo que permitirá a las empresas estimar con precisión los
  ingresos futuros y ajustar sus estrategias de marketing y ventas en consecuencia.
  También incluirá una funcionalidad de automatización de correos electrónicos dirigidos,
  donde los usuarios podrán crear campañas personalizadas y programarlas para ser
  enviadas automáticamente a clientes potenciales o existentes según se cumplan ciertos
  criterios.'
functional_requirements:
- description: Gestión de pipeline con visualización en tiempo real de oportunidades
    de venta
  id: FR001
  priority: High
- description: Funcionalidad de previsión de ventas basada en datos históricos
  id: FR002
  priority: Medium
- description: Automatización de correos electrónicos personalizados y programación
    de envíos
  id: FR003
  priority: High
- description: Permite a los usuarios crear, editar y eliminar campañas de correo
    electrónico
  id: FR004
  priority: High
- description: Integración con calendarios para programar envíos automáticos
  id: FR005
  priority: Medium
non_functional_requirements:
- description: Sistema seguro contra accesos no autorizados y violaciones de datos
  id: NFR001
  priority: High
- description: Escalabilidad del sistema para manejar un crecimiento significativo
    en el número de usuarios y transacciones
  id: NFR002
  priority: Medium
- description: Interfaz intuitiva y fácil de usar para todos los niveles de usuario
    (vendedores, gerentes)
  id: NFR003
  priority: High
- description: Accesibilidad del sistema en dispositivos móviles y tabletas
  id: NFR004
  priority: Medium
title: CRM de Ventas con Pipeline, Previsión y Automatización de Correo
input.product_vision:
product_name: SalesFlow CRM
product_summary: SalesFlow CRM is a specialized Customer Relationship Management system
  designed for sales teams. It integrates real-time sales pipeline management, data-driven
  forecasting, and automated, personalized email campaigns to streamline sales processes,
  enhance strategic decision-making, and boost revenue predictability for businesses.
target_users:
- Sales professionals
- Sales managers
- Business owners within small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)
value_proposition:
- Gain real-time visibility into the sales pipeline for effective opportunity management.
- Improve sales predictability and resource allocation through accurate forecasting.
- Increase sales team efficiency and customer engagement with automated email outreach.
- Facilitate data-driven strategic planning for sales growth.
key_capabilities:
- Real-time Sales Pipeline Management (visualization and tracking of opportunities)
- Predictive Sales Forecasting (based on historical data and trends)
- Automated & Personalized Email Campaign Management (creation, scheduling, delivery)
- Calendar Integration for automated email scheduling
- Secure and scalable platform
- Intuitive user interface
- Mobile accessibility
non_goals:
- General marketing automation beyond targeted email campaigns
- Customer service or support management features
- Inventory or order management
- Complex Business Intelligence (BI) features beyond sales forecasting
- Extensive third-party integrations in the initial release
success_metrics:
- Increase in sales pipeline conversion rates
- Improvement in sales forecast accuracy
- Reduction in manual email outreach time
- User adoption rate among sales teams
- Growth in customer lifetime value
last_updated: 2023-10-27 10:00:00+00:00
